output_list.criticism: Integer overflow in the mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value, causing a potential trap due to overflow of 'mintedAmount + balanceOf[target]'.
Integer overflow in the sell function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'amount * sellPrice'.
Integer overflow in the buy function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'amount * buyPrice'.
Integer overflow in the transferFrom function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'balanceOf[_from] -= _value'.
Integer overflow in the burnFrom function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'balanceOf[_from] -= _value'.
